november.title: 3-D Secure Authentication not available
november.raw:

As a result, your customers may have received an error message and their transaction may have ended in a status 0 (incomplete/invalid).  Depending on your account configuration: - your customers may have returned to the previous page to reattempt the payment with a different payment method or - the transaction may have been processed without 3-D Secure.)

This issue results in a number of transactions receiving a status 0 (incomplete/invalid) due to the impossibility of performing a 3-D Secure check. november.title: New WLOP release 4.159
november.raw:
Completed ( WLOP: new release in PRODUCTION Version 4.159 We are proud to inform you that the latest version of the WLOP payment platform is now available in both the TEST and PRODUCTION environments.  Please note, however, that there are no new features / changes deployed within this release that concern your business. In case of doubt, we suggest to check our Support site under 'Home' - 'News' - 'Changelog':  https://support.legacy.worldline-solutions.com/en/news/changelog#november2023 Thanks to your cooperation with WLOP, you now have access to one of the most complete and innovative solutions on the market. Furthermore, you have our guarantee that these products will also constantly continue to grow with you, in line with market needs and especially with your requirements.)
 Update ( As previously communicated, there is a new release (version 4.159) of the Worldline (WLOP) platform.  Tomorrow, 08/11/2023, the release – which was previously made available in our TEST environment - will be converted into PRODUCTION. The conversion will be completed at around 09:00 CET. We will be closely monitoring this operation in order to deal with any bugs that may arise. We are doing everything to ensure that the WLOP payment platform continues to work without a hitch during this operation. Please also note that there are no new features / changes deployed within this release that concern your business. In case of doubt, we suggest to check our Support site:  https://support.legacy.worldline-solutions.com/en/news/changelog#november2023)
 Update ( We are happy to confirm that the new Worldline release (version 4.159) is now successfully implemented in the TEST environment. Please note, however, that there are no new features / changes deployed within this release that concern your business. In case of doubt, we suggest to check our Support site under 'Home' - 'News' - 'Changelog':  https://support.legacy.worldline-solutions.com/en/news/changelog The release will be moved to the PRODUCTION environment on Wednesday 08/11/2023.)
 Scheduled ( To provide our customers with new features, Worldline constantly invests in the capacity and functionalities of its payment platform.   On Wednesday 25/10/2023 there will be a new release 4.159 available in the TEST environment. This release is available for testing purposes in our TEST environment before being moved to our PRODUCTION environment at a later stage. A detailed description of these new release functionalities will be available on our Support Site under 'Home' - 'News' - 'Changelog' ( https://support.legacy.worldline-solutions.com/en/news/changelog ) on the day of the TEST release. At this stage, no changes are being done to the PRODUCTION environment and no live transactions will be affected. We are planning to move this new release to production on Wednesday 08/11/2023.)

october.title: SSL certificate change for Worldline (WLOP) platform
october.raw:
Completed ( The scheduled maintenance has been completed.)
 Scheduled ( We would like to inform you that the SSL (security) certificates of secure.ogone.com and secure2.ogone.com are going to be updated on Monday 02/10/2023 between 07:00 and 09:00 CEST in order to ensure continuous security of your future transactions. Is there any action needed at my side? Only if you have specific security measures in place to validate the complete chain of the certificate including the root, or if you trust only selected root certificates explicitly installed, you may have to adapt your system in order to accept the new certificates. Please contact your integrator, webmaster or infrastructure engineer explaining this requirement and make sure the upgrades are done at your side, if necessary, before Monday 02/10/2023 07:00 CEST. To receive a copy of the new security certificates, please contact our Support Team by e-mail, phone or webform:  https://support.legacy.worldline-solutions.com/en/help/contact/)

september.title: WLOP:  New release 4.158
september.raw:
Completed ( We are proud to inform you that the latest version of the Worldline payment platform is now available in both the TEST and PRODUCTION environments.  You can find detailed explanation and further information on this release on our Support Site under 'Home' - 'News' - 'Changelog'. All these changes and extra functionalities are made available to you automatically and free of charge, in both the TEST and the PRODUCTION environments. Thanks to your cooperation with Worldline, you now have access to one of the most complete and innovative solutions on the market. january.title: Service with TWINT restored
january.raw: Resolved ( Please be informed that due to an external technical issue, some of your customers might have been unable to make payments online via TWINT between 11:55 and 12:33 CET today (17/01/2023). We confirm that as of 12:33 CET, normal service has been resumed and your customers will now be able to make payments as expected. We also confirm that the issue has an external responsibility (independent of Worldline).)

january.title: Planned maintenance at PayPal slight interruptions possible
january.raw:
Completed ( The scheduled maintenance has been completed.)
 Scheduled ( Worldline has been informed about upcoming maintenance at PayPal . The maintenance is announced for 13/01/2023 between 02:00 and 08:00 CET. During the indicated period your customers may experience slight interruptions in the connection to the payment systems. Please forward this information to your technical department.)

january.title: Fraud Expert Scoring partially unavailable
january.raw:
Resolved ( This incident has been resolved.)
 Investigating ( Please be informed that due to a technical issue, certain Fraud Expert Scoring functionalities are temporarily disturbed.    Some of your transactions may be currently processed without Fraud Expert Scoring. However, other fraud prevention services – 3-D Secure, FDM, FDMA Checklist and FDMA Scoring – are functioning normally.     Our dedicated teams are working to resolve this matter with utmost urgency. We will update you as soon as the activity is restored to normal.    We apologise for any potential inconvenience.)

january.raw:

Please note that the issue concerns our support sites only, while access to our Back Office and general payment processing are working as expected.    We apologise for any resulting inconvenience.)
